StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetProduc.onStatusByRecruiterID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @RecruiterID uniqueiden..er ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT p.Produc.onStatusHistoryID, p.RecruiterID, p.MonthCode, p.CalendarYear, p.OnProduc.on, p.NonProduc.onReasonCode, p.OtherReasonDetail, p.UpdatedByUser, p.DateUpdated FROM dbo.Produc.onStatusHistory p WHERE p.RecruiterID = @RecruiterID ORDER BY CalendarYear DESC, MonthCode DESC
